" This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to the institutions that are resilient enough to lead America back, " Mike Pence said. I believe those are, the institutions are, and have always been, faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism. Mike Pence met earlier in the day with officials including Republican Gov. Mitch Daniels , who can't run for third term and also is considering whether to enter the 2012 presidential campaign.
